question:
Which among the following was/ were declared as the main goals of Congress in the Nagpur session of 1920?
1. Remedies of Jallianwala Bagh Massacre
2. Settlement of the drawbacks of Khilafat Movement
3. Attainment of Swaraj
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: In the Nagpur session of INC in the year 1920 under the presidentship of C Vijayaraghavachariar, the resolution of the Non-cooperation movement was passed. and the goals of the Congress were declared. Those are remedies of Jallianwala Bagh Massacre, settlement of the drawbacks of Khilafat Movement, attainment of Swaraj. Swaraj means \"swaraj within the British Empire. if possible and outside, if necessary\".
